document_data.name: Katelyn Lerskin
document_data.mainbody:
'''Katelyn Lerskin''' was a [[Gur]] monster hunter from a tribe led by [[Ulma]] that traveled along the [[Sword Coast]] and [[Western Heartlands]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|''You're talking to the wrong hunter. You need to see Ulma.''|Katelyn Lerskin}}
document_data.Description: Katelyn was a tan-skinned Gur with short reddish brown hair and a facial [[tattoo]]. She wore a set of [[leather armor|leathers]] and was armed with a [[war hammer]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Katelyn Lerskin's monster hunter tribe found itself targeted by the [[vampire]]s of [[Baldur's Gate]] during the [[Absolute]] crisis when the Gurs camped in the [[Rivington]] district of the city, along with a small army of refugees displaced by the conflict. To the Gurs' horror, the tribe's children were abducted by the vampires under orders from [[Cazador Szarr]]. Katelyn could be found near Ulma as she attended the tribe's funeral bonfire.
